meanings.sent1: The store was underbought on umbrellas, so many customers got wet in the rain.
meanings.sent2: She realized she had underbought snacks for the party when they ran out quickly.
meanings.sent3: The underbought supply of pencils led to a hilarious situation where everyone had to share one.
meanings.sent4: His underbought collection of books made his bookshelf look quite empty.
meanings.sent5: The underbought stock of toys left many disappointed kids at the store.

meanings.definition: Bought for less than the market value.
meanings.sent1: The underbought jacket was a great deal for such high quality.
meanings.sent2: He felt proud of his underbought antique find at the flea market.
meanings.sent3: The underbought painting turned out to be a valuable masterpiece.
meanings.sent4: Her underbought jewelry collection sparkled just as brightly as the expensive ones.
meanings.sent5: The underbought car he bought was a steal compared to others on the lot.
